settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
The Xtrallux Laser Comb Alpha works by providing laser energy to stimulate hair follicles.

The Xtrallux Laser Comb Alpha features 9 laser diodes and includes a therapeutic massage option. Utilizing low-level laser therapy (LLLT), the Xtrallux Comb stimulates hair follicles at a cellular level, promoting hair growth.

The Xtrallux Laser Comb Alpha has teeth that part the hair and allow the maximum amount of laser energy to reach the scalp.

settings.heading: Is It Right for You?
settings.content:
The Xtrallux Hair Regrowth Laser Comb can be used by men and women with thinning hair (including color treated hair) or pattern baldness caused by a hereditary condition.

Please note that this device is NOT intended for people with advanced hair loss and balding. Laser therapy treats viable hair follicles. It cannot treat hair follicles that no longer produce any hair.

See indication for use for more details.

settings.heading: What's Included
settings.content:
• Xtrallux Laser Comb Alpha (with Removable Comb Cover)
  • Power Adaptor including Charging Cable & Charging Plug
  • Storage Case
  • User Manual

settings.heading: Benefits
settings.content:
• Increases volume of hair on scalp. 
• Medically-accepted way to treat hereditary hair loss.
• Restores healthy hair growth by revitalizing scalp follicles. 
• Clean, mess-free treatment for both men & women.
• Drug-free & safe treatment using light energy. 
• No known adverse side-effects.
• Quick & easy protocol. Wear just 6 minutes each day.

settings.heading: Warranty
settings.content: XTRALLUX warrants its registered devices purchased from an authorized reseller for a 1 year after the date of purchase. Defects due to faulty materials and workmanship will be repaired or replaced at the expense of XTRALLUX, as long as a valid proof of purchase is provided within the qualifying period. Damage from the use of unauthorized replacement parts will void this warranty. The user should strictly adhere to all instructions included in the user manual. This Warranty does not cover damage due to improper operation or maintenance, connection to improper voltage supply, or attempted repair by anyone other than the company. This warranty is not transferable and does not cover damage due to acts of God, misuse, negligence, accident, or modification of ant of its parts as deemed by our repairs department. Register your device within 30 days of purchase on www.xtrallux.com/warranty.

settings.heading: Contraindications
settings.content: Do not use if you may be pregnant or have cancer or hemorrhagic diseases. Do not use if you have a pacemaker as the device may interfere with its operation.
